Text: Thanks for posting this movie. Let's not forget that it also stars the wonderful Anna May Wong - the first Asian actress to break into the Hollywood mainstream and cross race barriers. Though she was a favourite with movie-goers, she was often paid less than her white co-stars. Wong received less than a third of Dietrich's salary for appearing in 'Shanghai Express'.

Thank you for the film, it was really enjoyable. Nice to see that in 4th year of sound they were making so great movies. 
I must add that - this being the film where cinematography is the major star, especially the shades of black, and the quality of light - the copy is only "informative", far from the rip quality it needs.

Never forget:

"It took more than one man to change my name to Shanghai Lily."

Many thanks for this!
